name: Gelldonia
description:
Story:
The struggle for dominance over the islands set on this blue sea planet continues. The faction of navy blue coats is in the lead in conquest. The other kingdoms have joined forces to face them together. You, as an adventurer or a mercenary, set off on a ship of red coats to attack the enemy's fort, which is still under construction. This is the last chance to conquer the northern lands.

Features:
- fight with weapons inspired by 17th and 18th century equipment
- collect resources and create new unique items
- play together with your friends in multiplayer mode
- earn gold and gain experience to advance to a higher rank and lead the squad yourself
